Dear Parent_E,

Thank you for your message.

At a high level, the place remains unfilled because we are still allocating it strictly according to our admissions priority order. We are not able to bypass families who rank ahead of you, and we cannot confirm in advance whether or when the place would reach the next position.

In terms of timing: we typically move to the next family on our priority list only after (a) a higher-priority family has declined, or (b) we have not received a confirming application/acceptance from higher-priority families within our response window for that stage. Because conversations and applications can arrive at different times, we can’t provide a specific date for when (or if) we would reach your position.

If you would like to remain in consideration in case the place is still available after higher-priority families have been processed, you are welcome to submit (or re-submit) a formal application at any time; we will review it in line with the priority list and the seat status at that moment.

Sincerely,
